subject: Basketball
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: The former Memphis Grizzlies assistant Scott Adubato has been hired as an assistant at Seton Hall.“He is used to working with some of the best in the business in Mike Fratello, Hubie Brown and Jerry West,” Seton Hall Coach Bobby Gonzalez said of Adubato.Adubato spent parts of two years on Fratello’s coaching staff. He also was a scout for the W.N.B.A.’s Liberty, working with his father, Coach Richie Adubato.
